Articles.Content:
Is not included in the list: PhD, in materials science...

Also, my mother language is Spanish... But games and films I usually play/see in English or Japanese.

Yup, no box for my highest degree either. Considering how many very educated people play ksp, Squad is really aiming low by not including options beyond graduate.
Wrote in my own entry. "Kerbal Space Program: Newtonian Nightmare".

Kerbal Space Program: First Kontracts

"First contact" to "First contracts" to "First Kontracts" = Best name for update ;P

Kerbal Space Program: First Kontracts

"First contact" to "First contracts" to "First Kontracts" = Best name for update ;P

Nah, sticking a K to everything isn't always the best idea.

I also chose Rocket Industry. It just seems right.

Kerbal Space Program: Big Business.

Space contracts, big rockets, lots of cash, and, uh... big explosions...

Yeah, "First Contract" is an excellent suggestion. Everyone will get the reference, and it's totally relevant.

Take heed, silver tongued PR guys!

KSP: Industry titans sound fun

EDIT. @Above First contract. YES. JUST
First contract scores well in my book too. Oh, and sorry for the nonsensical survey answers, I was just not willing to share some of those to vote for a name.

KSP 0.24: No More Free Launch

Brilliant! Seconded.

Kerbal Space Program: First Kontracts

"First contact" to "First contracts" to "First Kontracts" = Best name for update ;P

What is this, Mortal Kombat? No, "First Contract" is good, no plural, and definitely no "K".

Highly tempted to suggest "Geoff". Or "Nigel".

But "First Contract" will do fine.
Hahhhahaha xD "1st contract"

How about simply KSP 0.24: TANSTAAFL

Any rocketeer worth his salt will understand a Heinlein reference!

Isn't that a Niven reference?

Kerbal Space Program: Who wants to be a Munallaire?

Isn't that a Niven reference?

TANSTAAFL = There ain't no such thing as a free lunch!

That's been around for ages, isn't it from some book or film to do with space or something? I don't remember... I presume that's what Nova means though!

Edited June 25, 2014 by Random Tank
Answer for Red Iron Crown
I had already done the survey, but +1 to No More Free Launch!

Isn't that a Niven reference?

No you're thinking of TANJ, or There Ain't No Justice, which is an easier acronym to say out loud but doesn't make much sense for 0.24

[/nerd]

No you're thinking of TANJ, or There Ain't No Justice, which is an easier acronym to say out loud but doesn't make much sense for 0.24

[/nerd]

Right you are, I was getting my sci-fi acronyms mixed up. I should know better, I read The Moon is a Harsh Mistress twice. Tanstaffle!
Industry titans as none of the others really sounded that cool.
Kerbal Space Program: Dawn of the Beancounters
I choose Space Tycoon. I loved the Tycoon games as a kid!

Yup, no box for my highest degree either. Considering how many very educated people play ksp, Squad is really aiming low by not including options beyond graduate.

For the record a masters and doctorate are considered graduate degrees and there is indeed an option for graduate degree in the survey.
I put down 'Moar Boosters' but having read 'First Contract', I think im gona back that one :L
What about 'Buy Moar Boosters' ?
Thanks for reminding me about my education and employment status, survey!

Because of 0.24 having Mission Control...

KSP 0.24 - We've got a problem

Or, a more unrelated one:

KSP 0.24 - Rise of the planet of the krakens
